title: Akali R range
body: Hey, i just noticed that akalis shadow dance is smaller than intended. Checked patch notes and her ult range was reduced to 700 which is still 100 longer than her q range but ingame the indicator says otherwise. Was wondering if there was a fix just for clarity Thanks :)

replies.body: she isn't very balanced at all, she actually quite broken, thats like saying riven isn't broken

riven isn't broken? i understand why you don't think that cause your a jungler/support but seriously dude she is messed up, you don't really have to verse a riven, the insane poke, the insane cd, the insane mobility.. riven is also a bruiser which makes her even more disgusting and the fact she has a stun... jesus as if she isn't broken, oh and the shield and then the ranged ult and then the fact she doesn't use anything e.g.. mana or energy or even rage... like what the hell? you must be nuts mate..

this is true, but the way she is broken, i play renekton, i can destroy most rivens, but she has a stun, low cd, get aways, a shield that is a getaway and a ranged ult plus no mana. yes she can be beaten, never said she couldn't, but she is very strong

Every champ is broken, it's just a matter of do you have the ability to actually play against it, clearly you do not.

Pink Ward > Akali
CC/kiting > Riven
